document.docAuthor: Zhong, Hua, Yang, Lian-Fang & Morse, John C.
document.masterDocTitle: The genus Plectrocnemia Stephens in China (Trichoptera, Polycentropodidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The genus Plectrocnemia Stephens in China (Trichoptera, Polycentropodidae)

bibRefCitation.author: Schmid
bibRefCitation.refString: Schmid, F. (1965) Quelques Trichopteres de Chine II. Bonner Zoologische Beitrage 16 (1 / 2), 127 - 154. (in French).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Plectrocnemia hoenei
Schmid 1965
: 146
, pl. 7 , f. 1–3 (male); type locality: China (Zhe-jiang Province: West Tian-mu Mt.). Li 1998 : 63–64, 334 .
